mapper.insert: insert into user (email, age, name, pwd, is_admin, nick_name, avatar) values (#{email}, #{age}, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{isAdmin}), #{nickName}, #{avatar})
mapper.select: select email, age, name, is_admin, nick_name, avatar, reg_at from user order by reg_at
select email, age, name, is_admin, nick_name, avatar, reg_at from user where email = #{email}
select email, age, name, is_admin, nick_name, avatar, reg_at from user where email = #{email}, pwd = #{pwd}
select follower, following from user where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update set is_admin = #{isAdmin}, nick_name = #{nickName}, avatar = #{avatar} where email = #{email}
